Text.Page:
They're up to something.

Who? The {@LinkCreature:33#910#necromancers}. I don't know much about them—we catch only glimpses of them—but I think they're in charge.

See if you can gather some intelligence...from a necromancer corpse.

Let me look at that.

Aha! It says there that Thulsa built some kind of device in the Prison of the Abyss—wherever that is—and is capturing dead souls that should be returning to the Dream.

That explains a lot, doesn't it?
I'd love to see what's in a {@LinkCreature:33#910#necromancer}'s pocket. Wouldn't you?
